column1: Franco da Rocha is a municipality in the state of São Paulo. It is part of the Metropolitan Region of São Paulo. The population is 145
column2: 755 (2015 est.) in an area of 132.78 km². The suburban city is served by CPTM Line 7 (Ruby).

column5: the municipality signed a Friendship Declaration with Stepanakert
column6: the capital of the partially independent Republic of Artsakh.
